snippet.title: Police hunt after indecent act, assault at Wollongong bike track
snippet.content:
Police are searching for a man after he committed an act of indecency and assaulted a woman on a bike track at Wollongong on Sunday night. Two women were walking along the bike track between Marine Drive and Bank Street, when they noticed a man standing in the middle of the track committing an act of indecency about 7.30pm. The women, aged 23 and 20, attempted to run past the man and he grabbed the older female around her mouth pulling her to the ground. The man ran from the scene and was last seen heading north along the cycle path. The woman was not injured and police were called. Police searched the area but were unable to find the man. The women were not able to provide a further description of the attacker. Anyone with information: 1800 333 000.
File photo.
